test_setup.given: A running API server and no pre-existing tasks with the same data.
test_setup.then: A new task is created and returned with status 200.
test_setup.when: A POST request is made to /tasks with all valid fields.

test_cases.description: Verify that task creation fails if the 'title' field is missing.
test_cases.name: Create Task with Missing Title

test_setup.then: The API returns 422 with a validation error.
test_setup.when: A POST request is made to /tasks without the 'title'.

test_cases.description: Verify that task creation fails if the 'description' field is missing.
test_cases.name: Create Task with Missing Description

test_setup.then: The API returns 422 with a validation error.
test_setup.when: A POST request is made to /tasks without 'description'.

test_cases.description: Verify that task creation fails if the 'priority' field is missing.
test_cases.name: Create Task with Missing Priority

test_setup.then: The API returns 422 with a validation error.
test_setup.when: A POST request is made to /tasks without 'priority'.

test_cases.description: Verify that task creation fails if the 'due_date' field is missing.
test_cases.name: Create Task with Missing Due Date

request_body_json.description: This task has no due date.
request_body_json.title: No Due Date

test_setup.then: The API returns 422 with a validation error.
test_setup.when: A POST request is made to /tasks without 'due_date'.

test_cases.description: Verify that task creation fails if the 'user_name' field is missing.
test_cases.name: Create Task with Missing User Name

test_setup.then: The API returns 422 with a validation error.
test_setup.when: A POST request is made to /tasks without 'user_name'.

test_setup.then: The API returns 422 with a validation error.

test_setup.given: A running API server and the service is set to throw an exception.
test_setup.then: The API returns 500 Internal Server Error.
test_setup.when: A POST request is made to /tasks with a payload that triggers an exception.

test_cases.description: Verify that task creation fails if 'Content-Type' header is missing.
test_cases.name: Create Task with Missing Content-Type Header

test_setup.when: A POST request is made to /tasks without 'Content-Type' header.

test_cases.description: Test successful creation of a new task with all required fields present.
test_cases.name: Create Task With All Required Fields

test_setup.given: The system is running and no tasks exist.
test_setup.then: The API returns 201 Created and the created task in the response.
test_setup.when: A valid POST /tasks request is made with all required fields.

test_cases.description: Test creation fails if the 'title' field is missing from the request payload.
test_cases.name: Create Task Missing Title

test_setup.then: The API returns 400 Bad Request with an error message listing 'title' as missing.
test_setup.when: A POST /tasks request is made without the 'title' field.

test_cases.description: Test creation fails if more than one required field is missing from the payload.
test_cases.name: Create Task Missing Multiple Fields

response_body_json.error: Missing required field(s): title, priority, due_date, user_name

test_setup.then: The API returns 400 Bad Request naming all missing fields in the response.
test_setup.when: A POST /tasks request is made with only 'description' provided.

test_cases.description: Test creation fails if the request body is completely empty.
test_cases.name: Create Task With Empty Body

response_body_json.error: Missing required field(s): title, description, priority, due_date, user_name

test_setup.then: The API returns 400 Bad Request listing all required fields as missing.
test_setup.when: A POST /tasks request is made with an empty JSON body.

test_cases.description: Test creation fails if the Content-Type header is missing.
test_cases.name: Create Task Without Content-Type Header

test_setup.then: The API returns 400 Bad Request with an appropriate error message.
test_setup.when: A POST /tasks request is made without Content-Type header.

test_cases.description: Test creation fails if the Content-Type header is not 'application/json'.
test_cases.name: Create Task With Incorrect Content-Type

test_setup.then: The API returns 400 Bad Request with an appropriate error message.
test_setup.when: A POST /tasks request is made with Content-Type set to text/plain.

test_cases.description: Test creation succeeds even if all required fields are present but are empty strings, as no content validation is required.
test_cases.name: Create Task With Empty String Fields

test_setup.then: The API returns 201 Created and echoes back the empty fields.
test_setup.when: A POST /tasks request is made with all required fields present as empty strings.

test_cases.description: Test creation with maximum reasonable string lengths for all fields, ensuring the API accepts long data.
test_cases.name: Create Task With Maximum Length Strings

test_setup.then: The API returns 201 Created and the created task reflects all long values.
test_setup.when: A POST /tasks request is made with very long string values for all fields.

test_cases.description: Test creation fails if the request body is not valid JSON.
test_cases.name: Create Task With Non-JSON Body

response_body_json.error: Request body must be valid JSON

test_setup.then: The API returns 400 Bad Request with an error about the body format.
test_setup.when: A POST /tasks request is made with an invalid JSON body.

test_cases.description: Test creation succeeds even if field values are numbers or booleans, as no type validation is required beyond presence.
test_cases.name: Create Task With Wrong Data Types

test_setup.then: The API returns 201 Created and the created task reflects the provided values.
test_setup.when: A POST /tasks request is made with incorrect data types but all fields present.

test_cases.description: Tests successful creation of a task when all required fields are present and location is 'Ames'.
test_cases.name: Create task with all valid fields (location Ames)

test_setup.then: 200 OK with created task data returned
test_setup.when: POST /tasks with all required fields and location 'Ames'

test_cases.description: Tests successful creation of a task when all required fields are present and location is 'Boone'.
test_cases.name: Create task with all valid fields (location Boone)

test_setup.then: 200 OK with created task data returned
test_setup.when: POST /tasks with all required fields and location 'Boone'

test_cases.description: Tests failure when location is not 'Ames' or 'Boone'.
test_cases.name: Create task with invalid location

test_setup.then: 400 Bad Request with error message
test_setup.when: POST /tasks with location 'Des Moines'

test_cases.description: Tests failure when the required 'title' field is missing.
test_cases.name: Create task missing title

test_setup.then: 400 Bad Request with error message
test_setup.when: POST /tasks without 'title'

test_cases.description: Tests failure when the required 'description' field is missing.
test_cases.name: Create task missing description

test_setup.then: 400 Bad Request with error message
test_setup.when: POST /tasks without 'description'

test_cases.description: Tests failure when the required 'priority' field is missing.
test_cases.name: Create task missing priority

test_setup.then: 400 Bad Request with error message
test_setup.when: POST /tasks without 'priority'

test_cases.description: Tests failure when the required 'due_date' field is missing.
test_cases.name: Create task missing due_date

test_setup.then: 400 Bad Request with error message
test_setup.when: POST /tasks without 'due_date'

test_cases.description: Tests failure when the required 'user_name' field is missing.
test_cases.name: Create task missing user_name

test_setup.then: 400 Bad Request with error message
test_setup.when: POST /tasks without 'user_name'

test_cases.description: Tests failure when the required 'location' field is missing.
test_cases.name: Create task missing location

test_setup.then: 400 Bad Request with error message
test_setup.when: POST /tasks without 'location'

test_cases.description: Tests that location is case sensitive; 'ames' and 'boone' (lowercase) are invalid.
test_cases.name: Create task with location case sensitivity

test_setup.then: 400 Bad Request with error message
test_setup.when: POST /tasks with location 'ames' (lowercase)

test_cases.description: Tests that extra fields in the payload are ignored and do not cause errors.
test_cases.name: Create task with extra fields in payload

test_setup.then: 200 OK with created task data, extra field ignored
test_setup.when: POST /tasks with all required fields and an extra field

test_cases.description: Tests creation with 1-character fields (minimum non-empty values).
test_cases.name: Create task with minimum valid field lengths

test_setup.then: 200 OK with created task data
test_setup.when: POST /tasks with 1-character values for all fields

test_cases.description: Tests validation for an empty string in the 'title' field.
test_cases.name: Create task with empty string title

test_setup.then: 400 Bad Request with error message
test_setup.when: POST /tasks with empty string in 'title'

test_cases.description: Tests validation for an invalid due_date string.
test_cases.name: Create task with invalid due_date format

test_setup.then: 400 Bad Request with error message
test_setup.when: POST /tasks with due_date format '31-07-2024'

test_cases.description: Tests that a numeric value in 'priority' (should be string) is rejected.
test_cases.name: Create task with priority as number

test_setup.then: 400 Bad Request with error message
test_setup.when: POST /tasks with 'priority' as number

test_cases.description: Tests boundary condition with maximum reasonable lengths for string fields.
test_cases.name: Create task with maximum field lengths

test_setup.then: 200 OK with created task data
test_setup.when: POST /tasks with maximum field lengths
